backup.approveTitle: wants you to become a backup wallet
backup.description: At this stage, you are only defining the backup. The backup will have no access to your funds, or control over your Liquid Vault, until the activation stage
backup.intro: a spare key to your Liquid Vault
backup.introDesc1: Define a backup wallet that can claim ownership of your Liquid Vault if you lose access to your main wallet.
backup.introDesc2: The backup will have no access to your funds, or control over your Liquid Vault, until you activate it.
backup.notEnoughKiro: Not enough KIRO to proceed with this step
backup.onboardingDesc: You can access your funds from your backup wallet
backup.standbyMode: Your vault is in standby mode
backup.youCanClaimOwnership: You can claim ownership with your backup or main wallet
backup.areYouSureWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to remove your backup?

connect.title: How to connect to a dapp
connect.step1: 1. Copy WalletConnect URL from dapp connection screen.
connect.step2: 2. Come back to Liquid Vault and paste URL into field below.
connect.step3: 3. The dapp is now connected into your Liquid Vault!
connect.step4: 4. Go back and use your dapp as usual.

transactions.title: How to use dapps
transactions.step1: 1. Execute a transaction from your chosen dapp
transactions.step2: 2. Return to Liquid Vault and click CONFIRM
transactions.step3: 3. Return to your dapp to see results

dappConnect.testnetWarning: You are on a test Network, you should connect to the Ethereum main network in order to use this service

inheritance.cantCreateMoreHeirsDesc: You can't add more heirs. You can edit them, or move on to the next step.
inheritance.createMoreHeirsDesc: You've chosen your first heir. You can add more, or move on to the next step.
inheritance.timerReachZero: When the timer reaches 0 the funds will be sent to your heirs
inheritance.resetTimerAnyTime: You can reset the timer at any time
inheritance.cancelAnyTime: You can cancel your inheritance settings at any time
inheritance.recommended6MonthsAhead: We recommend setting the timer at least 6 months ahead
inheritance.description: Your heirs received their funds safely.
inheritance.intro: Don't let the blockchain inherit your money
inheritance.introDescription: Finally a decentralized solution to crypto inheritance transfers. Kirobo inheritance enables you to allocate assets to up to eight heirs in case the worst happens.
inheritance.howItsWorksDescription:
Add your heirs

1) Select heirs (You can select up to 8 heirs)
2) Add heir
3) Set the timer
inheritance.selectedAssets: These are the assets you've selected to be distributed to your heirs. The percentage assigned to each heir defines how much of each asset they receive.
inheritance.willBeActivatedOn: The inheritance will be activated on
inheritance.onboardingDesc: With Liquid Vault you can inherit your funds to your loved ones
inheritance.inactivityDesc: When the timer hits 0 your assets will be sent to your heirs.
inheritance.heartBeatTimer: Heart-beat the system to reset the timer
inheritance.helpInfo: Once the timer runs out the funds will be sent to the heirs

unlockInfo.connect: Kirobo Safe supports a wide range of wallets that you can choose to interact with your Safe.
unlockInfo.why: Why do I need to connect a wallet?

unlock.title: Welcome to Kirobo's Vault
unlock.decentralizeSolution: A decentralized solution to protect you from losing access to your funds
